body.p: can be configured as an ready to use external search engine for the output. represents a server-side alternative to the default client-side search engine embedded in the WebHelp output.
This search engine is recommended to be used due to the following benefits:

li.p: It is very easy to configure as a search engine for the output. You just need to configure Oxygen Feedback for your website generated with output and enable the Enable content indexing option in the section.

ul.li: A fast response even for large documentation.
Advanced features like: faceted search, semantic search or labeling content.
